title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Pizza Delivery Challenge
content:
Satisfy the citywide craving for grease and melted cheese by taking part in the first ever Pizza Delivery Community Challenge.

If the community can band together to deliver 10 million pizzas, all GTA Online players will receive the Pizza Thisâ€¦ Tee the week after hitting the target. Simply taking part in the challenge and delivering three pizzas will unlock the Weekly Challenge award of GTA$100,000.
